title: Document agent-browser E2E testing workflow
description:
Create documentation for E2E testing using agent-browser.

Documentation should cover:
1. How to run E2E tests with agent-browser skill
2. Test flow checklist (auth, teams, profile, etc.)
3. Best practices for agent-browser testing
4. How to debug failed test flows
5. Screenshots and verification steps

Update CLAUDE.md and/or create dedicated testing docs.

This ensures consistent testing approach for future development.
acceptance_criteria: Testing documentation complete and in CLAUDE.md
